explanation: [0-0] A man in a black short-sleeved shirt is standing in a kitchen with his mouth open, holding a large white container in both hands. On the marble countertop, there is a transparent glass container. A refrigerator and other kitchen supplies are placed behind the man in black. There are black subtitles on top that read "When I want chocolate milk:".

It talks and squeezes the chocolate sauce into the cup.
